    Class SimpleMapper

    Provides simple object mapping functionality between two objects of different types.

    Map<T1, T2>(T1)

    Maps the properties from the input object to a new instance of the output object type.

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    T1 input

    The input object to map from.
    Returns
    Type Description
    T2

    A new instance of the output object type with properties mapped from the input object.
